name: Infernoble Knight - Roland
text: (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card from your hand to that target as an Equip Spell that makes it gain 500 ATK. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn: You can add 1 FIRE Warrior monster or 1 Equip Spell from your Deck to your hand, except "Infernoble Knight - Roland". You can only use each effect of "Infernoble Knight - Roland" once per turn.
